Вообщем мы знаем что игра прекрасна, так что я напишу "Как сделать шоколадный кекс в микроволновке" 
Нам нужно: 
Сахар - 3ст.л.
Мука - 3 ст.л.
Масло Сл. - 2 ст.л.
Молоко - 2 ст.л.
Сода - 1/3 ч.л.
Какао - 1 ст.л.
Яйцо - 1шт.

Как готовить. Нужно найти (желательно) прозрачную миску (желательно средней формы), Берете КАК ХОТИТЕ ложите в миску перемещеваете все до состояния (как сказать так что вы поняли?) "сметанки". Ложите в микроволновку на 5-8 мин. Приятного аппетита, порадуйте своих близких с этим вкусным кексом, кстати после приготовления насыпте сахарную пудру чтоб было еще вкуснее!
ч.л. - чайная ложка
ст.л. - столовая ложка
шт - ну вы поняли (для тупых "штука")

cs起源，可能就是我的开始吧（盗版v70)接触到的游戏，然后慢慢接触到了steam，同时也起了个bb这rz名称。

Cs起源在cs系列中一直有点不温不火的感觉，对比竞技，也没csgo和cs1.6那么出众，但社区的各种娱乐模式才让cs起源一直活到2014年(csgo的发售让cs起源慢慢的进入棺材），虽然现在大多数服务器已经关闭了，但cs起源带给我的快乐还是不会忘记的。

感谢UB, S.R, DODS, 僵尸乐园等服务器。

Круто.

It's older, but it's still worth getting. Don't expect it to be similar to any modern FPS's, because it's not. It's round based, fairly well balanced, and filled with all kinds of community content. It's amazing to see a game this old getting so many updates to this very day. I'd have to say the only bad part is that 90% of anything good about the game forces you to deal with the community face-to-face. I say this is bad because the community can either be your best friend, or the biggest lot of trolls you've ever seen (it's usually the latter). I consider it a classic, and I think it's worth every bit of its price.

Counter-Strike: Source за долгое время существования смог стать культовым сетевым шутером. На сегодняшний день в игру играют более нескольких тысяч игроков одновременно. Игра понравится любителям классических шутеров и тем, кто просто хочет развлечься.
J'ai tellement joué un jeux sa coche, maintenant c le tour a CS GO

I love Counter Strike: Source! It has awsome graphics for its time and is colorful as f@*k. I like how it takes more skill than Call of Duty but, I'm not here to shred on COD. I also like COD. I recommend this game to anyone who is looking for a break from COD and or has a low-end computer. I think the top two best weapons are the M4A1 and the UMP 45(even though the P90 is a little more powerful). Two best secondaries in my visual conception is the Five-Seven and the Desert Eagle. Keep in mind that the weapons aren't actually called this in-game There's a lobby I play in where you have infinite lives and the guns are renamed to there actual model name as what I referred to in this review. In conclusion I hope you found found this review helpful and again I reccomend it to low-end pc gamers. If you have a Gaming Computer like I'm about to have, don't bother with this game, CSGO is just as good.

Player with a 16 hours on CS:S and alot of alts is gonna tell you something about CS:S!!!
New To CS:S,and you have been playing alot of CS:GO?
One thing what i can say about CS:S that,this game it's awesome!
There's alot of diffrense with other CS Games,for example CS:GO.
In CS:GO your desert eagle's recoil it's pretty high,but in CS:S it's almost like No Recoil and that's easier to play.
Also in CS:S There's no skin like in CS:GO,so you aren't gonna waste tons of money in a virtual game.
In CS:S there's a nice Anti-Cheat-Systems,as well there's zBlock and there's CS:S Anti-cheat..
I've been looking for a couple of weeks now,i can't see eny cheaters VAC has banned players for cheating,glad the cheats has been detected so everyone would play without thinking other team is cheating.
You can bhop easily on CS:S,you can jump easier on CS:S,the AK-47 Rifle it's easier to use and the AWP (Sniper) it's looking nice,you cant see a shit in your scope if you move.
As in CS:GO there's a map called de_nuke ,but in CS:S it's a bit more awesome Terrorists can attack a bit easier from outside,if there's an AWP in CT,Terrorists can hide behind a little wall.
Going B-Site from outside it's a little harder than in CS:GO,you have to run behind the hole near CT Spawn,from that Hole you can go to B-Site.
Thing what i especially love on CS:S it's if you are in a tunnel and you crouch and jump a bit,you can see trhough walls,about 2 seconds.. So you can see where are the enemys..
If you try to play ESEA in CS:S,there's more skilled players that in CS:GO.
The desert eagle (Night hawk) in CS:S it's average,i would say it's the game's best gun only if you know how to play with it,it doesn't move around like in CS:GO and the recoil it's awesome.
Now.. The bhop system isn't blatant bullsh1t like in CS:GO,in CS:GO it's harder to speed up while bhopping+strafing,in CS:S it's alot of easier (Not for Newbies ofc) As well you can jump to ladders and from ladders you get high speed,so you can kill the CT if he's camping.
Wallshots are alot of easier.
In CS:S if you try to join on a server it doesn't take like a one hour,like in some of CS:GO servers with alot of plugins..
In CS:GO you can play competitive for free ofc,in CS:S there's competitive system (ESEA) But you can still find some servers that are like competitive and stuff..
Would you really pay a lot of money on CS:GO and get banned from competitive 7Days? Or would you play CS:S
and have some fun with this awesome game?
Also if you want to improve your aim for CS:GO or eny other FPS/War games,try out CS:S,as i told you the desert eagle's recoil it's almost No Recoil,so you need only reflex for improving Aim!
Fight against Zombies in CS:S without that the server lag's horrible..
The graphics on CS:S aren't like 1.6 or CS:GO,still it looks cool,if you put everything on High-Quality and stuff it will look more cool :P 
You dont even need a good computer or processor for CS:S,i played on my bad laptop CS:GO (AMD 2.70Ghz) ,
i had about 30 FPS all the time even with bots...
In CS:S i tried with my bad laptop,i got like 70FPS on every server expect zombies.
Also if you want more FPS on CS:S there are alot of people who give CS:S FPS Configs,they give you more FPS.
The point it's if you buy CS:S,you dont waste a fuck1ng money to virtual skins,you can have fun,you can bhop easier,the power of Desert eagle(Night hawk) it's awesome,and you wont be scammed (Because there's no skins)
BOT'S will not add you if you play CS:S, expect if you have a knife in your inventory :3
I recommend start From CS:S and then go on CS:GO,from CS:S you will get a lot of experience and skill.
Starting from a Counter Strike 1.6 ? Nah i just dont recommend that,moving from CS 1.6 to CS:S and then CS:GO?
It Will change your mind,first you can see a shit tons of pixels,then skill and then Money Wasting.
So go fucking RIP off your dads wallet and fucking buy shit skins,or play CS:S !!!!!!!!!!!

[h1]COUNTER-STRIKE: SOURCE... A continuação de um clássico![/h1]

Produzido pela [b]Valve Software[/b] e lançado oficialmente em 7 de outubro de 2004, [b]Counter-Strike: Source[/b] é um jogo de tiro em primeira pessoa, sendo o sucessor do tão popular [b]"Counter-Strike 1.6"[/b] e [b]"Condition Zero"[/b]. Para alavancar as vendas de [b]Half-Life 2[/b], a VALVe usou os seus direitos com a série Counter-Strike para criar uma versão melhorada, com a redução de alguns erros clássicos e novos gráficos, utilizando o novo motor gráfico [b]"SOURCE"[/b]. 

De início o [b]Counter-Strike: Source[/b] não tinha muitos jogadores e servidores, principalmente por que o jogo ficou restringido apenas aos compradores de Half-Life 2. Mas com o tempo o jogo foi ganhando força, novos mapas, suportes e assim sua comunidade foi crescendo. Após a liberação do jogo para venda e a divulgação com altas notas na imprensa especializada, novos servidores surgiram, migrando uma boa parte dos jogadores da versão anterior.

[table]
    [tr]
        [th]ANÁLISE CRÍTICA[/th]
        [th]NOTA (0-10)[/th]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]Multiplayer[/td]

    [/tr]

        [td]9,2[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]Experiência de Jogo[/td]
        [td]9,0[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]Diversão[/td]
        [td]9,5[/td]
    [/tr]
[/table]

MÉDIA FINAL: 9,2 

Counter-Strike: Source é um ótimo jogo e com evoluções consideráveis ótimas. Sem dúvida nenhuma manteve o incrível legado da franquia COUNTER-STRIKE e não deixa de desapontar. Se você ainda não teve a oportunidade de desfrutar este jogo, não perca mais tempo e compre logo. Até a próxima análise, se cuidem e tchau tchau!

Oldie, but goldie.
I had a life once...
and then I bought Counter-Strike: Source.

I wasn't much for the original game until I got into CS:GO, even now I don't care for the Source version.
EXCEPT the vast amount of gameplay modes available.

I spent at least half of my time in ZombieMod servers, spraying down zombies from within barricades. The other half consists of recently gungame, surf maps, and jailbreak.

I don't regret buying this game, I've definitely gotten my money's worth!

Классная игра! Есть террористы , есть спецназ, есть бомба, которую одни должны заложить и успешно взорвать, а другие не дать им этого сделать. Или есть все те же террористы и спецназ, а так же заложники. Которых одни должны эвакуировать на свою базу, а другие не дать этого сделать. Никакой прокачки. Каждый раунд покупаешь новое оружие, деньги получаешь за убийство, или в конце раунда. Сумма зависит от того выиграл ли ты, или же проиграл. Приятная графика, качественная озвучка делают эту игру отличным шутером. Советую всем.
